task.title: Publish a Post to Storify 2 Using the Livefyre Mobile App
task.shortdesc: Publish a post from your mobile device to engage your users with instant information with the media or text you upload from your mobile device.

step.cmd: Log in to the Livefyre mobile app.
Click on the camera icon to upload media.
Select media from your mobile device or use your camera to create new media to upload.
